Play.Header: Arizona Cardinals at 12:09

Play.PlayDescription: (12:09) 12-J.McCown pass intended for 81-A.Boldin INTERCEPTED by 42-A.Henry at DAL 42. 42-A.Henry for 58 yards, TOUCHDOWN. Heavy pressure by Ware. It's the first time the Cowboys have returned an interception for a touchdown since Oct. 19, 2003 when Mario Edwards returned an INT 27 yards for a TD at Detroit.
